Operation 'post_/improve' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details. Original summary was missing entirely. Description lacked clarity about the operation's primary purpose (contributing to model improvement) and was missing explicit output details. Reorganized content to clearly distinguish input constraints, response behavior, and timeline expectations. Added context about what constitutes a valid submission (images the service currently struggles with) to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
Submit an image to the remove.bg Improvement program * Contribute an image that remove.bg is currently not able to remove the background from properly * Help us make remove.bg better * Get better results for similiar images in the future Notes: * By submitting images through the API you agree to the Improvement Program Conditions * File size: up to 22MB * Input resolution: up to 50 megapixels * up to 100 files per day.
Higher rate limits are only available to high-volume solution users; get in touch here. Requires either an API Key to be provided in the `X-API-Key` request header or an OAuth 2.0 access token to be provided in the `Authorization` request header. Please note that submissions are used on a best-effort basis and the extent of expected improvement varies depending on many factors, including the number of provided images, their complexity and visual similarity. Improvements usually take several weeks to become effective.
data.summary_suggestion: Submit image to improvement program for background removal enhancement
data.description_suggestion:
Submits an image to the remove.bg Improvement Program to help enhance background removal capabilities for similar images. This operation accepts images that the current background removal service struggles with, contributing to model improvements.

Input constraints:
* File size: up to 22 MB
* Input resolution: up to 50 megapixels
* Rate limit: up to 100 files per day
* Image source: File upload (binary or as base64 encoded string) or download from URL

Response: Returns confirmation of submission. Note that improvements are processed on a best-effort basis and typically take several weeks to become effective. By submitting images, you agree to the Improvement Program Conditions.

Requires either an API Key in the `X-API-Key` request header or an OAuth 2.0 access token in the `Authorization` request header.
data.reasoning: Original summary was missing entirely. Description lacked clarity about the operation's primary purpose (contributing to model improvement) and was missing explicit output details. Reorganized content to clearly distinguish input constraints, response behavior, and timeline expectations. Added context about what constitutes a valid submission (images the service currently struggles with) to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/account' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needed improvement in output details (explicitly stating what fields are returned) and better explanation of the balance tracking behavior as a side effect/operational consideration. Added clarity about the deprecation notice and authentication requirements for consistency with other operations.

data.current_summary: Fetch credit balance and free API calls.
data.current_description:
Get the current credit balance and number of free API calls.

Notes:

* Balance changes may be delayed by several seconds. To locally keep track of your credit balance, you should therefore only call this endpoint initially (or e.g. when the user manually triggers a refresh), then use the `X-Credits-Charged` response header returned with each image processing response to adjust the local balance.
* The "*sizes*" field is always "all", is deprecated and will soon be removed.
data.description_suggestion:
Retrieves the current account credit balance and remaining free API calls quota.

Response includes:
* Current credit balance (in credits)
* Number of free API calls remaining
* Account status and usage information

Important notes:
* Balance changes may be delayed by several seconds. For real-time tracking, use the `X-Credits-Charged` response header returned with each image processing operation to adjust your local balance.
* The "sizes" field is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

Requires authentication via API Key in the `X-API-Key` request header or OAuth 2.0 access token in the `Authorization` request header.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description needed improvement in output details (explicitly stating what fields are returned) and better explanation of the balance tracking behavior as a side effect/operational consideration. Added clarity about the deprecation notice and authentication requirements for consistency with other operations.
